tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_audit (
  audit_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  database_name VARCHAR(50),
  audit_date DATE,
  auditor_name VARCHAR(100),
  vulnerabilities_found TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE security_audit_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    findings TEXT,
    remediation_plan TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE security_audit_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    action_taken TEXT,
    user_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE security_audit_users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT,
    role TEXT,
    email TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE audit_logs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE vulnerabilities (
    vulnerability_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    severity ENUM('LOW', 'MEDIUM', 'HIGH') NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    remediation_steps TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE security_checks (
    check_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    check_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    result TEXT,
    date_checked TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    password_hash TEXT,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE
)

CREATE TABLE SecurityAudits (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_date DATE,
    auditor_name VARCHAR(50),
    findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Vulnerabilities (
    vulnerability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    description TEXT,
    severity VARCHAR(20),
    status VARCHAR(10),
    remediation_plan TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AuditLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    audit_id INT,
    action_performed VARCHAR(50),
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    role VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Permissions (
    permission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    role VARCHAR(20),
    permission_type VARCHAR(50)
)
